title: ReadMe ReadYou
description:
Create unique and entertaining GitHub profile READMEs with ReadMe ReadYou. Stand out from the crowd with our fun and customizable README generator. Some of the features are:
1. Different styles of readmes that can be generated.
2. A full markdown editor to view and edit your readme as you please.
3, An embed URL that allows you to add the readme directly from the website to your profile.
